title: Turkey-Bacon, Lettuce, Avocado Wrap
preparation: Spread 1 tablespoon (15 ml) of mayonnaise onto each wrap.
Top each with 1 lettuce leaf, 2 slices of tomato, and 3 slices of bacon.
Fold in the ends of each wrap and roll up tightly.
Wrap in parchment or wax paper and cut on the diagonal. Place in a sandwich bag or sandwich container.
